example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_1S انا)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC فِعْلاً)) (SBAR-NOM-PRD (WHNP-1 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (ADJ.VN مِسْتَغْرَب) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP مِن) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG قِصَّة) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN الكاتِب)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ إِنّ) (S (NP-TPC-3 (PRON_3P هُم)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP ٱِعْتَقَلُوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN بِنْت)) (PP-PRP (PREP عَ) (NP (NOUN شَأْن) (S (S (NP-SBJ (NOUN أَخُو) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ حاطِط) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG كُوفِيَّة) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG فِلَسْطِينِيَّة))))

arg.g: that they arrested a girl because her brother was wearing a Palestinian Kufiyya

example.arg: إِنّ هُم ٱِعْتَقَلُوا بِنْت عَ شَأْن أَخُو ها حاطِط كُوفِيَّة فِلَسْطِينِيَّة
